definition: to maintain the land (with rotation of crops or fertilizer)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: I think a month at a health resort will do you good.
sentences.chinese: 我看，到療養地去住一個月對你有好處。
你好，這是溫泉療養地嗎？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the characteristics and effects of convalescent factors in Lushan.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查分析廬山療養地自然療養因子特點及作用。

sentences.english: Bath in Britain is Eruope's famous spa town.
sentences.chinese: 英國的巴思是歐洲著名的礦泉療養地。

sentences.english: Penelope: You broke your arm in the spa.
sentences.chinese: 你在礦泉療養地摔傷了胳膊。

sentences.english: A heavy fog had suddenly enveloped the Presidential retreat.
sentences.chinese: 大霧突然籠罩了總統的休養地。

sentences.english: Objectives To investigate the climatic salutary factors in Dujiangyan salutarium.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查都江堰療養地氣候療養因子情況。
